3/ It is wonderful to see this terrible Omicron wave receding, but that doesn't make the pandemic over. 

We've had: Original virus (waves 1, 2), Alpha (wave 3), Delta (wave 4), Omicron (wave 5)...see a trend here?

There will be more waves & variants...

2/ Given Canada's improving COVID burden, it should come to nobody's surprise that some/many public health measures are lifting.

These measures were always meant to be temporary. Good.
